page.title: 17An 8 year old's Tastes ?
page.content: On Wednesday I got up at about 7.45.I read for 5 minutes,tidied my room, fed my goldfish and watered my plant.I went downstairs and got out the Frosties,milk,fruit juice and a glass.I sometimes have toast with my Mum's runny marmalade.Then I did my teeth and practised the piano.I play tunes like Sleeping Beauty.I got dressed and washed.I wear my dress,belt,cardigan,vest,shoes and socks.I got to school and put out my pile.After register I did my writing and then I made a card.We went out to play then it was music.I used the Indian bells.For lunch we had cottage pie, carrots,peas and gravy.After lunch we had our Fun Sports.I beat Kathryn in the running race and she beat me in the sack race.There were relay,obstacle and water races.
